title: invalid transaction v, r, s values in freezer
body:
Version 1.12.0 of types.Sender fails on some contract-creation transactions consistently.

```go
sender, err := types.Sender(types.LatestSignerForChainID(tx.ChainId()), tx)
if err != nil {
        log.Printf("sender of Ethereum block %d transaction hash %#x unavailable: %s", blockNo, tx.Hash(), err)
}
```

The first failure happens on block 54092, the second on block 66886, and so on.

```
2023/08/08 18:00:21 sender of Ethereum block 54092 transaction hash 0x9c81f44c29ff0226f835cd0a8a2f2a7eca6db52a711f8211b566fd15d3e0e8d4 unavailable: invalid transaction v, r, s values
2023/08/08 18:00:21 sender of Ethereum block 66886 transaction hash 0xf359761b1e9772116351369a1945d9a36efbd06862e2c280a8be0b1150f191d3 unavailable: invalid transaction v, r, s values
2023/08/08 18:00:21 sender of Ethereum block 81655 transaction hash 0x277c52349a4ec5a372f91a78214ea778e352a071909108cd3b8e2d83a64b7a57 unavailable: invalid transaction v, r, s values
2023/08/08 18:00:21 sender of Ethereum block 96252 transaction hash 0x8ac230db13feec03d0899c40d2b68485a19e2297d0b5eea08e4efec661ea21ec unavailable: invalid transaction v, r, s values
2023/08/08 18:00:21 sender of Ethereum block 100689 transaction hash 0xbeafec04e9df5b0644bd9cd55b0a140e1b2542a8aa5609978ecd3d10eba11134 unavailable: invalid transaction v, r, s values
```
